metadata.synopsis: Karlach's death scene. The tone for this is, for me, raw and real. Karlach is not in good shape here; the engine is burning her up, and she's soon to die.She may or may not be a mindflayer, she dies regardless.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I'm hot. Too hot. I think... I think this is it. The engine's finally cooked.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach in slowly immolating as she is using the last of her willpower to stay on the material plane

164.speaker: Player
164.text: Karlach, zhak vo'n'fynh duj. Know this - I am forever yours.
164.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

113.speaker: Player
113.text: Karlach, zhak vo'n'fynh duj. Know this - I am forever yours.
113.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

170.speaker: Player
170.text: Karlach... I thought after all we've survived, maybe one last miracle would rear its head... but no. I'm sorry.
170.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

153.speaker: Player
153.text: Karlach... the Lady of Loss takes everything in the end, but I thought we'd have some more time yet. I'm sorry.
153.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: Karlach... I... I love you. You taught me the impossible. In all my immortality, I'll never forget you.
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Do not yield, Karlach. Stay with us. Stay with the ones who love you.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

157.speaker: Player
157.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

171.speaker: Player
171.text: I am. I can do this.
171.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: We did it. I did it. The city's going to be all right. My friends are going to be all right. I can let go.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Doesn't matter if you're ready, girl. It's time.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: This thing is fucking hot. I feel like I'm falling apart. Am I... is this...?

79.speaker: Player
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

134.speaker: Player
134.text: I can't - I can't! Oh gods, it's getting worse!
134.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: There's no point resisting. It's happening. I'm dying, and I can't stop it.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

42.speaker: Player
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

179.speaker: Player
179.text: I'm slipping. I can't hang on. I... what's happening?!
179.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: No! There's still time - one last chance to find a way back to Avernus. I could live... in a way. I could live...
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

10.text: All right. All right. But I have to go. Now.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

100.speaker: Player
100.text: All right. All right. But I have to go. Now.
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

148.speaker: Player
148.text: You did everything you set out to do. It's time, honey.
148.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She explodes in a great riot of colour and flames. 

From the ashes below, a wisp floats up, levels with the eyeline, then flies away, up, to the heavens.

CinematicNodeContext: She explodes in a great riot of colour and flames. 

From the ashes below, a wisp floats up, levels with the eyeline, then flies away, up, to the heavens.

108.speaker: Player

108.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She explodes in a great riot of colour and flames. 

From the ashes below, a wisp floats up, levels with the eyeline, then flies away, up, to the heavens.

CinematicNodeContext: She explodes in a great riot of colour and flames. 

From the ashes below, a wisp floats up, levels with the eyeline, then flies away, up, to the heavens.

141.speaker: Player
141.text: It's all right. I've got you. We can do this in three... two...
141.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She explodes in a great riot of colour and flames. 

From the ashes below, a wisp floats up, levels with the eyeline, then flies away, up, to the heavens.

116.speaker: Player
116.text: Take me, then. Go on, death - I'm yours.

146.speaker: Player
146.text: Karlach, by the gods. I don't want to lose you...

124.speaker: Player
124.text: Karlach, please... I'm not ready to go on without you.

130.speaker: Player
130.text: Karlach, no. If we had taken control, if we had become Absolute, I could have saved you.

119.speaker: Player
119.text: Do not yield, Karlach. The world has need for you yet. I have need for you yet. Please.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Karlach. Know you part us with honour. You are strong. You are ready.

167.speaker: Karlach
167.text: Karlach. Know you part us with honour. You are strong. You are ready.

155.speaker: Lae'zel
155.text: Karlach. Know you part us with honour. You are strong. You are ready.

189.speaker: Karlach
189.text: No, Karlach. Stay with me, please. We've shared too much to part like this.

135.speaker: Karlach
135.text: No, Karlach. Stay with me, please. We've shared too much to part like this.

83.speaker: Gale
83.text: No, Karlach. Stay with me, please. We've shared too much to part like this.

186.speaker: Karlach
186.text: Karlach, no - fight it. You're stronger than this, my friend.

99.speaker: Karlach
99.text: Karlach, no - fight it. You're stronger than this, my friend.

194.speaker: Astarion
194.text: Karlach, no - fight it. You're stronger than this, my friend.

154.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
154.text: If this is your end, face it with the courage you have shown in your life, Karlach.

63.speaker: Wyll
63.text: Karlach, the very best of us. You were always the hero. My hero.

104.speaker: Shadowheart
104.text: Karlach... I thought after all we've survived, maybe one last miracle would rear its head... but no. I'm sorry.

184.speaker: Halsin
184.text: Do not yield, Karlach. This is not your time.

66.speaker: Jaheira
66.text: We're here, soldier. You're not alone.

192.speaker: Minsc
192.text: Karlach - no. You will be well. Boo says you have many more battles to fight yet.

34.speaker: Karlach
34.text: I'm hot. Too hot. I think... I think this is it. The engine's finally cooked.

191.speaker: Karlach
191.text: We did it, soldier. The city's going to be all right. And so are you.
191.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Her back is to the player; she's staring out at a vista. When she speaks she's a little strained, out of breath. On 'And so are you' she turns her head toward us; we see her in quarter profile.)

48.speaker: Karlach
48.text: Engine's finally cooked. Held on just long enough.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: (She turns around. Her engine is pulsating dangerously.)

89.speaker: Player
89.text: No, Karlach! Stay with me. We can still save you.
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: She falls to her knees, holds a hand up as the player tries to approach her, says 'Careful - hot'. She's affected by the heat, it's starting to overwhelm her.

123.speaker: Karlach
123.context: CinematicNodeContext: She falls to her knees, holds a hand up as the player tries to approach her, says 'Careful - hot'. She's affected by the heat, it's starting to overwhelm her.

156.speaker: Karlach
156.text: It's the one thing I can't beat, isn't it? Same below as above. I love. You.
156.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Her gaze moves upward, toward the sky, as though she's starting to lose consciousness. She looks at hte player on 'you' and says it with love).

7.speaker: Karlach
7.text: You. More than anything. I saw - gods!

65.speaker: Karlach
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

37.speaker: Karlach
37.text: No. Stop this. Come with me, Karlach. Come to Avernus. Live.
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

139.speaker: Player
139.text: No. Stop this. Come with me, Karlach. Come to Avernus. Live.
139.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

161.speaker: Player
161.text: No. Stop this. Come with me, Karlach. Come to Avernus. Live.

72.speaker: Wyll
72.text: No. Stop this. Come with me, Karlach. Come to Avernus. Live.

14.speaker: Wyll
14.text: We can't let her die - not like this, not now.

109.speaker: Player
109.text: No. Stop. I won't allow this. Karlach, you're coming with me - back to Avernus.
109.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: No. Stop. I won't allow this. Karlach, you're coming with me - back to Avernus.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

136.speaker: Wyll
136.text: No. Stop. I won't allow this. Karlach, you're coming with me - back to Avernus.
136.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

117.speaker: Player
117.text: It's your decision, Karlach. You have to choose.
117.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

56.speaker: Wyll
56.text: So? What do you say? Die here, now, or live on with the Blade of Avernus at your side? Zariel won't touch you. I swear it, Karlach.
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

102.speaker: Karlach
102.text: Fine. I'll go. Wyll. With you.
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

183.speaker: Karlach
183.text: But we have to go. Now.
183.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

128.speaker: Player
128.text: No. Stop. My love - We can save her. We can take her to Avernus.
128.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: No. Stop. My love - We can save her. We can take her to Avernus.

8.speaker: Wyll
8.text: No. Stop. My love - We can save her. We can take her to Avernus.

121.speaker: Wyll
121.text: We can't let her die - not like this, not now.

112.speaker: Player
112.text: Go Karlach. Wyll will be with you; you won't be alone anymore.

103.speaker: Player
103.text: I love you, Wyll, but I can't follow you to Avernus. The two of you should go together.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: It's your decision, Karlach. You have to choose. Wyll will go with you. Zariel won't be able to touch you.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: It's your decision, Karlach. You have to choose. We'll go with you. Zariel won't be able to touch us.

23.speaker: Wyll
23.text: So? What do you say? Die here, now, or live on with people who love you. Zariel won't touch you. I swear it, Karlach.

97.speaker: Wyll
97.text: Thank the gods you've seen sense. Come! To Avernus we go - our next adventure awaits.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: Enough, Karlach. The three of us will make a new life in Avernus. Together.

190.speaker: Player
190.text: Karlach, my love, I can't watch you die. Wyll - I'll go with her. It should be me.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Wyll, you've done enough. It should be me who goes with Karlach. You can still live, Karlach. We'll do it together. What do you say?

82.speaker: Player
82.text: No, Wyll. Karlach's made her choice time and again. She's ready to go.

166.speaker: Wyll
166.text: I can't force her. But I don't want to watch, either. I can't.

193.speaker: Player
193.text: No! No Karlach! I won't allow this. You're going to live. We're returning to Avernus. Together.
193.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: No! No Karlach! I won't allow this. You're going to live. We're returning to Avernus. Together.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

32.speaker: Karlach
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: I know why you're afraid. I know why you don't want to go. But I'll be with you this time. I won't leave your side.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

126.speaker: Karlach
126.text: All right. All right. But we have to go. Now.
126.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

64.speaker: Karlach
64.text: I can't hang on much longer.
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

147.speaker: Player
147.text: I won't watch you die. Let's go.
147.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

78.speaker: Karlach
78.text: H-hurry. I'm going to... I don't have much time...
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: You have to choose, Karlach. It's your last chance. Do we go to Avernus, together? Or would you rather die here in Faerûn?
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

43.speaker: Karlach
43.text: I thought I knew... I thought I knew, but you...
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

1.speaker: Player
1.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She explodes in a great riot of colour and flames. The player recoils against the light and heat.

From the ashes below, a wisp floats up, levels with the player, then flies away, up, to the heavens. [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

30.speaker: Karlach
30.text: I'm ready. I... I... Stand back, I'm going to -
30.context:
CinematicNodeContext: She explodes in a great riot of colour and flames. The player recoils against the light and heat.

From the ashes below, a wisp floats up, levels with the player, then flies away, up, to the heavens. [Choices] Karlach on hands on knees state.

142.speaker: Player
142.text: Stay with her. Watch her. Be here.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: You were spectacular in every way.
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: (She approaches and puts a hand on the player's face. Then she staggers backward.)

160.speaker: Karlach
160.text: For you. And for the city, and for myself, and blah, blah. But most of all, for you.
160.context: CinematicNodeContext: (She approaches and puts a hand on the player's face. Then she staggers backward.)

74.speaker: Karlach
74.text: So were you. My friend. My companion. I adore you.
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: She approaches and puts a hand on the player's shoulder, gives it a hearty shake. She staggers backward.

158.speaker: Karlach
158.context: CinematicNodeContext: She falls to her knees, holds a hand up as the player tries to approach her, says 'Careful - hot'. She's affected by the heat, it's starting to overwhelm her.

187.speaker: Karlach
187.text: I never gave up. I did my best. I did my best.
187.context: CinematicNodeContext: Talking to self. Focusing through the agony of the fire, but still with her swagger.

87.speaker: Karlach
87.text: It's the one thing I can't beat, isn't it? I wanted to live. In my city. With my friends.
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Her gaze moves upward, toward the sky, as though she's starting to lose consciousness. She looks at hte player on 'you' and says it with love).

185.speaker: Karlach
185.text: But life is for the living. And I saw - gods!

152.speaker: Player
152.context: CinematicNodeContext: (She approaches and puts a hand on the player's face. Then she staggers backward.)

95.speaker: Karlach
95.text: And I'd do it again. Whatever it took. For the city. For the world. But most of all, for you.
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: (She approaches and puts a hand on the player's face. Then she staggers backward.)

45.speaker: Karlach
45.text: We did. Together. And now it's done.
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: She approaches and puts a hand on the player's shoulder, gives it a hearty shake. She staggers backward.

115.speaker: Player
115.text: It doesn't matter. It's over now.
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: (She approaches and puts a hand on the player's face. Then she staggers backward.)

28.speaker: Karlach
28.text: It matters, my love. What we did here matters. What we have... has been everything.
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: (She approaches and puts a hand on the player's face. Then she staggers backward.)

26.speaker: Karlach
26.text: So it is. We gave this city back its life. We did that.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: She approaches and puts a hand on the player's shoulder, gives it a hearty shake. She staggers backward.
